body_html:
I signed it!

As usual, after having to spend 5 minutes reverse engineering how that CLA page handles switching between multiple signed-in Google accounts. Seems it's impervious to the /u/1/ that GMail uses, and to the &authuser=1 that other places use. Glad this is easy in 2017.

Sorry, it's early in the morning, snark is irresistable.

body:
I signed it!

As usual, after having to spend 5 minutes reverse engineering how that CLA page handles switching between multiple signed-in Google accounts. Seems it's impervious to the `/u/1/` that GMail uses, and to the `&authuser=1` that other places use. Glad this is easy in 2017.

Sorry, it's early in the morning, snark is irresistable.
